articles.description: Steve Smith continues his revival in form with a magnificent century to put Australia on top against India on day two of the fourth Test in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Steve Smith century puts hosts in control at MCG

articles.description: Despite the big money spent to bring him to the club, new Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says if he does not win games the sack awaits.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ruben Amorim says job is in 'danger' if his side does not start winning

articles.description: Ninth seed Damon Heta hits a nine-darter but is knocked out by Englishman Luke Woodhouse in the third round of the PDC World Championship.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Damon Heta hits nine-darter in loss to Luke Woodhouse

articles.description: Mohamed Salah says it "feels different" as Liverpool come from behind to beat Leicester and move seven points clear at the top.
articles.title: Liverpool 3-1 Leicester City: Premier League leaders will 'stay humble' - but lead at top 'feels different'

articles.description: Iga Swiatek says she feared a more negative reaction to her doping ban and does not expect an appeal by the World Anti-Doping Agency after serving a one-month suspension.
articles.title: Iga Swiatek: Former world number one feared more negative reaction to doping ban

articles.description: Jason Myers kicks two field goals as the Seattle Seahawks keep their slim playoff hopes alive with a 6-3 victory against the Chicago Bears.
articles.title: NFL: Seattle Seahawks beat Chicago Bears to keep season alive

articles.description: The Portland Trail Blazers' Scoot Henderson scores the game-winning basket with 0.1 seconds left in one of four last-gasp NBA finishes.
articles.title: NBA round-up: Portland Trail Blazers, Miami Heat, Detroit Pistons & Washington Wizards earn dramatic wins

articles.description: The biggest annual club rugby fixture in the world is a gamble that paid off spectacularly and a constant hunt for new fans.
articles.title: Big Game 16: Inside Harlequins' Premiership rugby grand spectacle

articles.description: Tottenham could be without any fit centre-backs for Sunday's Premier League game against Wolves after Ben Davies suffers a setback in his recovery.
articles.title: Tottenham injury news: Ben Davies suffers setback as Spurs could be without fit centre-back

articles.description: Jockey Sam Ewing had his second Grade One win of the Christmas Festival on day two at Leopardstown.
articles.title: Leopardstown Christmas Festival: Romeo Coolio another winner for Sam Ewing and Gordon Elliott
